mainText:
This is such a sad day. I'm truly at a loss of words.
Steve because of you and your creative genius I was able to tap into my own i
nnovation. My music is what it is because you. To my regret I never got to m
eet you, but your spirit and energy will always be present whenever I work.

Thank you for your time on this earth,

You will truly be missed.
author: Dorian
